title: Meatloaf on the barbecue
ingredients: ['675g minced beef', '675g minced pork', '215g dry breadcrumbs', '160g finely chopped red onion', '1 egg, beaten', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '125ml barbecue sauce', '125ml tomato ketchup']
